name: The Indie Game Legend 3D
description: Blast vicious aliens, explore their mysterious labyrinth, and rescue indie game makers in this lighthearted NES inspired first-person action adventure!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
